title: WP_REST_API_Revision
description: A revision object in a REST API context.

author.description: The ID for the author of the revision.

date.description: The date the revision was published, in the site's timezone.

date_gmt.description: The date the revision was published, as GMT.

guid.description: The globally unique identifier for the post.

raw.description: GUID for the post, as it exists in the database. Only present when using the 'edit' context.

rendered.description: GUID for the post, transformed for display.

modified.description: The date the revision was last modified, in the site's timezone.

modified_gmt.description: The date the revision was last modified, as GMT.

parent.description: The ID for the parent of the revision.

slug.description: An alphanumeric identifier for the revision unique to its type.

raw.description: Title for the post, as it exists in the database. Only present when using the 'edit' context.

rendered.description: HTML title for the post, transformed for display.

raw.description: Content for the post, as it exists in the database. Only present when using the 'edit' context.

rendered.description: HTML content for the post, transformed for display.

block_version.description: Version of the content block format used by the post. Only present when using the 'edit' context.

raw.description: Excerpt for the post, as it exists in the database. Only present when using the 'edit' context.

rendered.description: HTML excerpt for the post, transformed for display.
